Node.definition: literally: to reach; hence: = process by which a certain event reaches the time for it to take place
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= man; ◄ son of Jozadak (יֹוצָדָק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) high priest (כֹּהֵן) time of exile
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= man; ► son of Shealtiel (שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל) or, according to of Pedaiah (פְּדָיָה) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► governor of Judea (יְהוּדָה) after the exile; according to , father of Meshullam (מְשֻׁלָּם) Hananiah (חֲנַנְיָה) and Shelomith (שְׁלֹמִית)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Jehoiachin (יְהֹויָכִין) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of Zerubbabel (זְרֻבָּבֶל)
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth|= person who is closely associated with God, who speaks on behalf of God, and through whom inquiries can be made of God
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an object to be firmly located in a certain place
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= a firm location, suitable for building upon
= state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger, such as aggression from the enemy, a dangerous animal, or death

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to the time after the event in focus
= religious celebration at the appearance of the new moon, i.e. at the beginning of the month
= a festival that is celebrated at fixed times
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities set apart humans or objects for a particular purpose or activity relating to the service of God, as a result of which they become holy (קָדֹושׁ)
= action by which humans show their willingness to give to God by presenting a generous offering
= something offered to God as a free gift without any obligation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
= action by which humans or deities start performing an event
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= person whose job it is to cut stones in a quarry and get them ready for construction
= person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth
= a liquid that can be consumed for refreshment or nourishment

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= inhabitant of Sidon (צִידֹון)
= inhabitant of Tyre (צֹר)
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= town; ◄ territory of Dan (דָּן) ► sea port
= state in which someone in authority has given permission for something to happen
= man; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) who allowed the exiles from Judah (יְהוּדָה) to return
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= action by which humans or deities start performing an event

= man; ► son of Shealtiel (שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל) or, according to of Pedaiah (פְּדָיָה) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► governor of Judea (יְהוּדָה) after the exile; according to , father of Meshullam (מְשֻׁלָּם) Hananiah (חֲנַנְיָה) and Shelomith (שְׁלֹמִית)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Jehoiachin (יְהֹויָכִין) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of Zerubbabel (זְרֻבָּבֶל)
= man; ◄ son of Jozadak (יֹוצָדָק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) high priest (כֹּהֵן) time of exile
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= various men; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► family head; returned from Babylonian (בָּבֶל) exile under Zerubbabel (זְרֻבָּבֶל) supervised those rebuilding the temple; in charge of worship after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= various men, possibly the same person; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) returned from exile
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose
= tubular or conical wind instrument with flared mouth and bright penetrating ringing tone; ◄ made out of metal; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Berechiah (בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: according to the hand(s) (of someone); hence: = state in which something takes place under the authority of someone else
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans produce musical sounds with their voice, often as a celebratory response, either set to a prescribed tune or spontaneous
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
literally: to lift up (one's) voice; hence: = action by which humans speak more loudly than usual

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= process by which humans understand the identity or nature of (other) humans, objects or events
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= state in which an event has a high intensity
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
